user_instruction: 'Send an email to the HR department at Global Dynamics (hr@globaldynamics.com) discussing John Smith'"'"'s candidacy. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
To: hr@globaldynamics.com  
Subject: Employment Verification & Reference Request – John Smith

Dear Global Dynamics HR Team,

I hope you are well. I am Jane Doe, Hiring Manager at Tech Innovations. John Smith has applied for a position with us and has provided your details for an employment verification and professional reference.

With John’s written authorization (available upon request), could you please confirm or provide the following:

• Employment dates (start date and, if applicable, projected or actual end date)  
• Current title and primary responsibilities  
• Employment status (full-time/part-time, permanent/contract)  
• Eligibility for rehire  
• Any general comments you are able to share regarding John’s performance, professionalism, and contributions during his tenure

If company policy limits the information you can release, kindly let me know what you are able to provide.

Please feel free to respond via email or reach me directly at (555) 123-4567. We would appreciate the information at your earliest convenience, as we are scheduling final interviews soon.

Thank you very much for your time and assistance.

Best regards,

Jane Doe  
Hiring Manager, Tech Innovations  
jane.doe@techinnovations.com  
(555) 123-4567
